metadata.title: CVE-2023-50868 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
Preparing an NSEC3 closest encloser proof can exhaust CPU resources

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-50868` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

bind9 - 1:9.18.18-0ubuntu2.1
bind9-dnsutils - 1:9.18.18-0ubuntu2.1
bind9-host - 1:9.18.18-0ubuntu2.1
bind9-libs - 1:9.18.18-0ubuntu2.1
bind9-utils - 1:9.18.18-0ubuntu2.1
bind9utils - 1:9.18.18-0ubuntu2.1
dnsutils - 1:9.18.18-0ubuntu2.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: bind9 package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:9.18.18-0ubuntu2.1').
isc-dhcp package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
unbound package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
dnsmasq package in mantic is affected and needs fixing.
pdns-recursor package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
knot-resolver package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
